div1.p: WARRANT IN THE FIRST INSTANCE TO APPREHEND A PERSON CHARGED WITH AN INDICTABLE OFFENCE.
Province of British Columbia, County of Vancouver, City of Vancouver.
To all or any of the Constables and other Peace officers, in and for the said City of Vancouver.

WHEREAS N. T. B. Pentreath of the City of Vancouver has this day been charged upon oath before teh undersigned Thos Crawford Esquire, one of His Majesty's Justices of the peace within and for teh said City of Vancouver, for that the said Pentreath on or about the 15th day of December, 1904, at the aforesaid City of Vancouver did unlawfully and fraudulently utter a forged document, as if it were genuine, knowing it was forged, and with intent to defraud.

These are therefore to command you in his Majesty's name, forthwith to apprehend the said N. T. B. Pentreath and to bring him before me or some other Justice of the peace in and for the said City of Vancouver, to answer unto the said charge, and to be further dealt with according to law.
Given under my Hand this 30th day of January in the year of Our Lord One Thouasnd Nine Hundred and Five, at Vancouver, in the County aforesaid.
